name: Haltarr
description: Pauses download clients when media is played on media servers.
longDescription: Haltarr is a Python Flask-based service that pauses or resumes download clients (SABnzbd, Deluge, qBitTorrent) when media is played or stopped on media servers (Jellyfin, Plex,Emby). It also notifies Discord of these events via webhooks.
